author: CTPPS
body:
This PR introduces a couple of cuts on Tx and Ty parameters of the CTPPS pixel tracks.
The goal is to save into CTPPSTrackLite object only quasi-parallel to beam tracks, the ones useful for physics.
The CTPPSTrackLite object is the only CTPPS object saved in miniAOD.
@jan-kaspar
title: CTPPS pixel track cuts on Tx and Ty
